column2: Oh, hello there! I'm still neck deep in this investigation. For now, I have some background work for you.

You'd think we would have gotten this file debacle sorted out by now! 

It's amazing how much time can pass when you're focused on a problem. 

Okay so now to the matter at hand. Let's go ahead and launch the System.

We're going to need you to get familiar with how the Operating System works. 

Browse around in the System a bit to learn about the differen areas, and then give this quiz a try. t
3) The System App lets you change your cursor into a wedge of cheese, a unicorn, and poop.
False? Really? Have you checked out the cursors? Try again.
Nice work! That's it for now. Just a little glimpse of the wonders of the System! I must be going now.

What was up with that quiz? Why is Saniel keeping us busy with quizzes when we should be investigating? 

Whoa, wait, whaaat? I just stepped on this thing. What is it?

Look, itâ€™s the Level 2 key for The System. Looks like we may get to do some investigating after all ;)
This will let us deeper into the new areas of the System. We def need to come back here later.
